a_wander

<goggle>
look stealth monster

MinMissileChance value
This is one part of the missile attack probability calculation. The lower this value is the more aggressive the monster is. 
This can be combined with the MISSILEMORE and MISSILEEVENMORE flags.
Default value is 200.
